named-query.name: findOrdersByUserId
named-query.query: select i from Order i where USER_ID = :USER_ID

named-query.name: findReservesByUserId
named-query.query: select i from Reserve i where USER_ID = :USER_ID

named-query.name: login
named-query.query: select i from User i where i.password = :password and i.email = :email
